1. NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS
   ====================

   STAY INFORMED

1. [![Taxes Due](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2373)](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=938)

   #### [First Quarter Taxes are due on February 1st.](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=938)

   2025 Final / 2026 Preliminary tax bills were mailed in September 2025 and contained the payment stubs for the 4th quarter of 2025 and the 1st and 2nd ... [Read on... about First Quarter Taxes are due on February 1st.](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=938)
2. [![rabies-clinic](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=9578)](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/DocumentCenter/View/10640/FREE-RABIES-CLINIC---FLYER)

   #### [Free Rabies Clinic](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/DocumentCenter/View/10640/FREE-RABIES-CLINIC---FLYER)

   WEDNESDAY
   FEBRUARY 11, 2026
   3:00 P.M. TO 7:00 P.M.
   Community Arts Center [Additional Info... about Free Rabies Clinic](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/DocumentCenter/View/10640/FREE-RABIES-CLINIC---FLYER)
3. [![Route 18 Rehabilitation Project](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6465)](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=260)

   #### [Route 18 Rehabilitation Project](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=260)

   The New Jersey Department of Transportation is conducting a long-term project along Route 18 in East Brunswick. [Read on... about Route 18 Rehabilitation Project](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=260)

[View All News](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?CID=1)

   KNOW WHAT’S HAPPENING

1. [![Heavenly Farms Tower Sign](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=7858)

   #### Heavenly Farms

   Baseball/Softball, Dog Park, Multipurpose Turf Fields and more.](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/Facilities/Facility/Details/Heavenly-Farms-12)
2. [![Public Library Opens in new window](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=7863 "Public Library")

   #### East Brunswick Public Library

   A place where you can dream, create, be your authentic self, and explore freely, without judgement.](https://www.ebpl.org)
3. [![Family](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=7861)

   #### Crystal Springs WaterPark

   Offers a crystal clear experience in outdoor recreational water activities.](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/250/Crystal-Springs)

1. Township Council
   ================

   MEET OUR MEMBERS

1. [![Mayor Brad Cohen](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=7626)](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/360)

   [Brad J. Cohen](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/360)
   --------------------------------------------------

   Mayor of East Brunswick ![](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=7620)

   "It is an honor to serve as your Mayor. We are a community that serves as a beacon of compassion and diversity sitting in the Center of New Jersey!"

* [Dana Zimbicki  
  Council President](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/409)

* [Dinesh Behal  
  Council Vice President](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/409)

* [Dana Winston  
  Councilwoman](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/409)

  Councilman](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/409)

  Councilman](https://www.eastbrunswick.org/409)
